name: Ted-bulk-video-plugin
tagline: TED Talks Bulk Video Downloader for Chrome
body:
__Helps you get all the video's from your current ted talks page.__

__Supports url's having the following formats:__

__a) http://www.ted.com__
__b) http://www.ted.com/talks.*__

__Note: It takes some time to get all the talk video links. So, please be patient.__

__Usage:__
__Once the video links are display you can click on them for download or copy those links to a Download Manager for bulk download. This bulk download feature will be available in this extension in future.__
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
